auth_unauthorized: You don't have permission to access this page
landing_subtitle: Sheet Music Library Management for Choirs
landing_phase_description: A standalone vault application for managing choir sheet music libraries.
landing_feature_upload_desc: Manage your choir's PDF sheet music library
landing_feature_invite_desc: Share scores with choir members via magic links
landing_feature_permissions_desc: Control who can view and download each score
login_no_account: Don't have an account? Ask your choir administrator for an invitation.
login_check_email_sent: We sent a magic link to
login_enter_code: Click the link in the email, or enter the 6-character code below:
welcome_message: Your account has been created successfully. You can now access your choir's sheet music library.
invite_no_member_instructions: To invite someone to your vault, first add them to the roster:
invite_step_2: Fill in their name and assign voices/sections
invite_role_owner_desc: Full system access including owner management
invite_roles_help: All members can view and download scores. Assign roles to grant additional permissions.
invite_link_info: A unique invite link will be generated. Share it manually with {name}. The link expires in 48 hours.
invite_error_help: If you believe this is an error, please contact your choir administrator.
register_subtitle: Create a Polyphony vault for your choir's sheet music library
register_email_hint: This will be the primary contact for your organization
register_note: Your vault will be reviewed and activated within 24-48 hours.
register_error_subdomain_taken: This subdomain is no longer available. Please choose another.
register_error_already_owner: You already own an organization. Contact support if you need another.
register_success_message: Your choir vault has been submitted for review.
register_success_subdomain_label: Your vault will be available at:
register_success_next_step_1: We'll review your registration within 24-48 hours
register_success_next_step_2: You'll receive an email when your vault is activated
register_success_next_step_3: You can then start uploading scores and inviting members
guides_subtitle: Learn how to use Polyphony based on your role
copyright_intro: If you believe copyrighted material has been uploaded without authorization, please submit a takedown request using the form below.
copyright_submitted_message: Thank you for your submission. We will review your request and respond within 48 hours.
copyright_score_id_placeholder: Optional: paste the score URL or ID
copyright_description_placeholder: Please describe the copyrighted work and explain why you believe the uploaded content infringes your rights.
copyright_attestation: I declare under penalty of perjury that I am the copyright owner or authorized to act on their behalf, and that I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material is not authorized.
